column4: run sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg -phigh and choose "fglrx" as the driver when asked ( not "ati" ) then restart X ( ctrl+alt+bkspace ) and your games should run full speed
the "ati" driver is the open source one, ATI named their proprietary driver "fglrx", why they did that I have no idea :)
